member.summary: This compiler generated class contains all the functions, globals and defines that are defined in the VOGUIClasses assembly.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBCreateFromFile(XSharp.__Psz)
member.summary: Create a device independent bitmap (DIB) from an image file.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBCreateFromPTR(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert an image file to a device independent bitmap (DIB).

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBDelete(System.Void*)
member.summary: Destroy a DIB created either by DIBCreateFromFile() or DIBCreateFromPtr().

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBGetInfo(System.Void*)
member.summary: Retrieve a pointer to the BITMAPINFO structure of a DIB.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBSaveAs(System.Void*,XSharp.__Psz)
member.summary: Save the DIB to a file.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBShow(System.Void*,System.Void*)
member.summary: Display the DIB within the specified window.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.DIBStretch(System.Void*,System.Void*,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Double)
member.summary: Display the DIB within the specified window.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.Enable3dControls
member.summary: Determines whether controls on windows created with the GUI classes are displayed using a sculpted, three-dimensional look.
member.remarks: Note - This function has no purpose in 32 bit programs. It is included for backward compatibility with 16 bit applications only.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.EnableAppVisualTheme(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the applications support for visual themes.
member.remarks: Note - For Windows XP and later only.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.GetAppObject
member.summary: Return the global App object for this application.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.GetFocusedObject
member.summary: Return the object corresponding to the control or window that currently has input focus.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.GetObjectByHandle(System.Void*)
member.summary: Return the object associated with a given window handle.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.GetThemeAppProperties
member.summary: Retrieves the property flags that control how visual styles are applied in the current application

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.IsAltPressed
member.summary: Get the current state of the Alt key.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.IsAppThemed
member.summary: Return the theme setting for the current application.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.IsControlPressed
member.summary: Get the current state of the Ctrl key.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.IsShiftPressed
member.summary: Get the current state of the Shift key.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.IsThemeEnabled
member.summary: Determine if visual theme support is enabled.
member.remarks: NOTE: For Windows XP or later only.

member.name: M:VOGUIClasses.Functions.VerifyThemeState
member.summary: Verifies the current theme state and sets the ThemeEnabled flag.
member.returns: The function returns the current value of the ThemeEnabled flag like the function IsThemeEnabled().
